name: RISING EVIL - Horror Action RPG
blurb: RISING EVIL is a tense, atmospheric horror themed action RPG, a mix of action and horror that will have you coming back for more.

rewards.reward: You Get a Free Copy of Rising Evil.\r\nYour name will also be added to the "Thank You's" in the end game credits.

You Get a Free Copy of Rising Evil. Your name will also be added to the "Thank You's" in the end game credits. This will also include a spoiler free game guide, game background story (short story), and I will also be condensing all artwork into a PDF file for your viewing pleasure.
